description: Ambassador Gordon D. Sondland tied President Trump to the Ukraine pressure campaign in his testimony to the House Intelligence Committee. Our reporters provided live coverage and analysis.
title: Full Analysis of Gordon Sondland's Testimony in Impeachment Hearings
title_page: Full Analysis of Gordon Sondland's Testimony in Impeachment Hearings - The New York Times
maintext:
Hello from the DCA flight deck! Pompeo’s spokeswoman just sent this from his plane, which is flying back to Washington from Brussels as we speak: Hello - this statement was just circulated on the plane by Morgan Ortagus, State Department spokesperson and attributable to her:
“Gordon Sonland never told Secretary Pompeo that he believed the President was linking aid to investigations of political opponents. Any suggestion to the contrary is flat out false.”
